definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
variant of 匹[pi3]/classifier for cloth: bolt
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower

sentences.english: Source: Goal. com"Olympiacos announce the acquisition of Liverpool's Spanish international Albert Riera."
sentences.chinese: 奥林匹亚科斯宣布签下利物浦的西班牙球星里埃拉。

sentences.english: Olympiacos announce the acquisition of Liverpool's Spanish international Albert Riera.
sentences.chinese: 奥林匹亚科斯宣布签下利物浦的西班牙球星里埃拉。

sentences.english: The same will apply to the game against Olympiacos at Emirates Stadium on Matchday 2.
sentences.chinese: 在第二比赛日主场与奥林匹亚科斯比赛也同样如此。

sentences.english: This celebration was held in Olympia- the Holy Land of ancient Greece.
sentences.chinese: 这个祭典活动在古希腊的圣地奥林匹亚举行。

sentences.english: Evergreen State is a public 4-year college in the northwestern city of Olympia , Washington.
sentences.chinese: 长青州是华盛顿奥林匹亚西北部的4年制公立学院。

sentences.english: München's Olympiastadion is truly one of the most extraordinary stadia in all the world.
sentences.chinese: 奥林匹亚球场可谓是世界上最壮观的球场之一。

sentences.english: This four- year cycle known as the "special Olympia."
sentences.chinese: 这四年的周期称为“奥林匹亚特”。

sentences.english: Olympiakos have made a move for Liverpool left-back Fabio Aurelio.
sentences.chinese: 奥林匹亚科斯已经求购利物浦的左边后卫奥雷里奥。
